snippet: To the Editor:    You report (news article, Jan. 10) that criminal charges have been filed against a California salad processor whose lettuce was linked to a 1996 food poisoning outbreak that sickened at least 61 people in the Middle West and Nort...
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: You report (news article, Jan. 10) that criminal charges have been filed against a California salad processor whose lettuce was linked to a 1996 food poisoning outbreak that sickened at least 61 people in the Middle West and Northeast.
abstract: Uriel Wittenberg letter comments on Janury 10 article on criminal charges filed against California salad processor whose lettuce was linked to 1996 poisoning outbreak (S)
